text: Brenda Russell (born Brenda Gordon, April 8 1944) is an American R&B; singer, composer, and keyboardist. She was born in Brooklyn, New York. She has had many hit songs on several musical charts. Her singing genres include R&B; and pop. ==Filmography== * Yakety Yak, Take it Back (1991) ... title: Brenda Russell
